original_text: So what did you go to see? Did you go to see a prophet sent by God? Yes! But I tell you, John was even more important than a prophet.
korean_text: 그러면 너희가 무엇을 보려고 나갔더냐 선지자냐 옳다 내가 너희에게 이르노니 선지자보다도 훌륭한 자니라

sentences.original_text: So what did you go to see?
Did you go to see a prophet sent by God?
sentences.korean_translation: 너희가 하나님께서 보내신 선지자를 보러 갔느냐?

sentences.original_text: John was even more important than a prophet.
